first_translate: let’s drink!!!

hangle: 황태자 때문에 너무 짜증 나서 기분 전환을 꼭 해야겠어!!
first_translate: I need something to take my mind off things! that jerk is really getting on my nerves...!
it's sweet...
fiona, are you there?
is that alcohol I smell?
have you been drinking?
this is just the beginning!
the real party starts now!
come join me. let’s have some drinks together for old times’ sake.
siegren...
drinking alone...
in his room...

hangle: 3. 아무렇지도 않게 같이 마시자고 방에 들이다니
first_translate: and inviting someone else over like it was nothing...
when will he learn how to protect himself from others?
wait...
do you want to tell me what happened?
no, it’s nothing...
really?
your tie looks all messed up.
were you fighting or something?
more or less.
a fight?! but this is your first day out in public as a member of high society!
that doesn’t sound like him at all...
or does it?
but w-with whom?
nobody important.
fiona...
huh?
it’s hard to see because it’s dark,
but could you untie this thing for me?

hangle: 시그렌은 어릴 적부터 목에 뭔가 닿는 것 자체를 싫어했지.
first_translate: even when we were young, sieg always hated having anything around his neck.
okay.
of course...
hm?
why do I feel so nervous about this...?
there’s such a strange atmosphere right now...
I’ll get it done quickly then.
all set.
now let’s go back inside and continue our little party!
take small sips since you’re not good with liquor.
by the way, who did you end up fighting?
prince harzen.
seriously?!
he turned out to be more annoying than expected.
I know exactly what you mean.

hangle: 혹시라도 그 녀석 옆에는 절대 가지 마.
first_translate: stay away from him no matter what happens.
alrighty.

hangle: 개인적으로 부딪힐 일이 없기를 바랄 뿐…
first_translate: I hope we don’t run into each other again--
huh?
siegren, why do you look like two people?
you must’ve gotten drunk already.
I’m fine...
I told you to pace yourself while drinking.
how can you sleep without any worries?
sometimes,

hangle: 네 머릿속을 열어 보고 싶다는 생각을 해.
first_translate: I wish I could open up your head and read your thoughts.
what makes you care for me even though you never ask anything of me?

hangle: 처음 만났을 때부터 줄곧 날 아끼는 이유가 대체 뭘까.
first_translate: ever since we met, you've treated me well despite knowing I'm not related by blood.
after all, nobody gives affection without expecting something in return...
to be honest, I still don’t understand you very much.

hangle: 너는 특별히 소중한 것도, 바라는 것도 없어 보여.
first_translate: nothing seems particularly precious or desirable to you.

hangle: 꼭 어디에도 뿌리를 내리지 못한 채 떠도는 민들레 홀씨 같아.
first_translate: you remind me of dandelion seeds floating aimlessly through the air without ever taking root anywhere.
I only hope...
...that one day, you find something worth wanting.
until then,

hangle: 적어도 지금만큼은 제일 행복한 꿈을 꾸기를.
first_translate: at least may you dream happy dreams tonight.
my dearest girl.
your grace,
what if siegren gets bullied at the royal palace?

hangle: 그 녀석이 따돌림 좀 당한다고 신경 쓸 성격이더냐.
first_translate: he wouldn’t give a damn even if they tried bullying him.

hangle: 황자로 인정받아 정식으로 황궁에 잘 들어간 녀석 걱정하지 말고,
first_translate: stop worrying about him. after all, he has officially become part of the imperial family.
start thinking about the upcoming meeting among the five families instead.
meeting among the five families?

hangle: 제국의 대표적인 개국 공신 가문들이 정기적으로 여는 회의다.
first_translate: it refers to regular meetings held by the founding families of the empire.
haa...
but I’m worried sick about siegren...
is that where the meeting takes place?
back then, I had no idea...
...the events that would unfold during the meeting...
...would lead me to meet eunice, the original story’s heroine,

hangle: 생각지도 못한 사건에 휘말리게 된다는 것을.
first_translate: as well as drag me into unexpected incidents.
